specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out.
